panels.description: The report contains comparative measurements number of running virtual machines and OS usage in for a selected cluster within the requested period.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    COALESCE (
        os_type,
        'RHEL'
    )
    AS os_type,
    AVG(vm_count),
    MAX(vm_count),
    MIN(vm_count)
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER (COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END
        AS os_type,
        history_datetime AS time,
        COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_vms.vm_id ) AS vm_count
    FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
            ON (
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_configuration_version
            )
        INNER JOIN enum_translator enum_os_type
            ON (
                enum_os_type.enum_key =
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.operating_system
                AND enum_os_type.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
                AND language_code = 'en_US'
            )
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms latest_config
            ON (
                latest_config.vm_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_id
            )
    WHERE
        -- Here we filter only the vms that are in active status
        v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_status = 1
        -- Filter vms list according to the datacenter that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
            )
        -- Filter vms list according to the cluster that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN ( '$cluster_id' )
        -- Here we get the vm latest configuration
        AND latest_config.history_id IN
            (
                SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_vms b
                GROUP BY b.vm_id
            )
       AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
       AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
       AND
            -- This will determine where deleted entities will be included in the report,
            -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
            CASE
                WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                    THEN latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                ELSE
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                    OR
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            END
    GROUP BY
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END,
        history_datetime

UNION ALL

    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER (COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END
        AS os_type,
        history_datetime AS time,
        COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_vms.vm_id ) AS vm_count
    FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
            ON (
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_configuration_version
            )
        INNER JOIN enum_translator enum_os_type
            ON (
                enum_os_type.enum_key =
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.operating_system
                AND enum_os_type.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
                AND language_code = 'en_US'
            )
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms latest_config
            ON (
                latest_config.vm_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_id
            )
    WHERE
        -- Here we filter only the vms that are in active status
        v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_hourly.vm_status = 1
        -- Filter vms list according to the datacenter that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
            )
        -- Filter vms list according to the cluster that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN ( '$cluster_id' )
        -- Here we get the vm latest configuration
        AND latest_config.history_id IN
            (
                SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_vms b
                GROUP BY b.vm_id
            )
       AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
       AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
       AND
            CASE
                WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                    THEN latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                ELSE
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                    OR
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            END
    GROUP BY
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END,
        History_datetime

UNION ALL

    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER (COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END
        AS os_type,
        history_datetime AS time,
        COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_vms.vm_id ) AS vm_count
    FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
            ON (
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily.vm_configuration_version
            )
        INNER JOIN enum_translator enum_os_type
            ON (
                enum_os_type.enum_key =
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.operating_system
                AND enum_os_type.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
                AND language_code = 'en_US'
            )
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms latest_config
            ON (
                latest_config.vm_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily.vm_id
            )
    WHERE
        -- Here we filter only the vms that are in active status
        v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_daily.vm_status = 1
        -- Filter vms list according to the datacenter that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
            )
        -- Filter vms list according to the cluster that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN ( '$cluster_id' )
        -- Here we get the vm latest configuration
        AND latest_config.history_id IN
            (
                SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_vms b
                GROUP BY b.vm_id
            )
       AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
       AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
       AND
            CASE
                WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                    THEN latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                ELSE
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                    OR
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            END
    GROUP BY
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END,
        history_datetime
)
AS all_query
GROUP BY os_type
ORDER BY os_type

panels.title: Active Virtual Machines by OS (BR18)

panels.description: This report contains a table and a chart displaying the number of hosts for each OS version for a selected cluster within a requested period.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    COALESCE ( v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_os, 'Unknown' ) AS os_type,
    COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_id ) AS host_count,
    cluster_name
FROM  v4_3_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly AS stats_hosts
    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_hosts
        ON (
            v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.history_id =
            stats_hosts.host_configuration_version
        )
    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_hosts a
        ON (
            a.host_id =
            stats_hosts.host_id
        )
    INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_clusters b
        ON (
            b.cluster_id =
            a.cluster_id
        )
WHERE
    v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id IN (
        SELECT v4_3_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
        FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
      WHERE
            v4_3_configuration_history_clusters.datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
    )
  --  AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
  --  AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
    -- Here we get the latest host configurations
    AND a.history_id IN (
        SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
        FROM v4_3_configuration_history_hosts b
        GROUP BY b.host_id
    )
    AND
        CASE
            WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                THEN a.delete_date IS NULL
            ELSE
                a.delete_date IS NULL
                OR
                a.delete_date IS NOT NULL
        END
GROUP BY
    COALESCE ( v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_os, 'Unknown' ), cluster_name

panels.title: Host OS Break Down (BR22)

panels.description: The report contains comparative measurements of number of running virtual machines and OS usage for a selected cluster within the requested period.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(time),
    COALESCE (
        os_type,
        'RHEL'
    )
    AS os_type,
    vm_count
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER (COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) LIKE '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END
        AS os_type,
        history_datetime AS time,
        COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_vms.vm_id ) AS vm_count
    FROM v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms
            ON (
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.history_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_configuration_version
            )
        INNER JOIN enum_translator enum_os_type
            ON (
                enum_os_type.enum_key =
                v4_3_configuration_history_vms.operating_system
                AND enum_os_type.enum_type = 'OS_TYPE'
                AND language_code = 'en_US'
            )
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_vms latest_config
            ON (
                latest_config.vm_id =
                v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_id
            )
    WHERE
        -- Here we filter only the vms that are in active status
        v4_3_statistics_vms_resources_usage_samples.vm_status = 1
        -- Filter vms list according to the datacenter that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN
            (
                SELECT cluster_id
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
                WHERE datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
            )
        -- Filter vms list according to the cluster that was chosen by the user
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_vms.cluster_id IN ( '$cluster_id' )
        -- Here we get the vm latest configuration
        AND latest_config.history_id IN
            (
                SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
                FROM v4_3_configuration_history_vms b
                GROUP BY b.vm_id
            )
       AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
       AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
       AND
            -- This will determine where deleted entities will be included in the report,
            -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
            CASE
                WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                    THEN latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                ELSE
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NULL
                    OR
                    latest_config.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            END
    GROUP BY
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) = 'OTHER OS'
                THEN 'Other OS'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%WINDOWS%'
                THEN 'Windows'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RHEL%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'RED HAT%'
                THEN 'RHEL'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'OTHER L%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like 'LINUX'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%UBUNTU%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            WHEN UPPER ( COALESCE ( enum_os_type.value,'Other OS' ) ) like '%SUSE%'
                THEN 'Other Linux'
            ELSE 'Other OS'
        END,
        History_datetime
)
AS all_query
ORDER BY os_type

panels.title: Active Virtual Machines by OS (BR18)

panels.description: This report contains a table and a chart displaying the number of hosts for each OS version for a selected cluster within a requested period.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    $__time(history_datetime),
    COALESCE ( os_type, MAX ( os_type ) over (partition by 1), '' ) AS os_type,
    host_count
FROM (
    SELECT
        history_datetime,
        COALESCE (
            v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_os,
            'Unknown'
        )
        AS os_type,
        COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_id )
        AS host_count
    FROM  v4_3_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly AS stats_hosts
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_hosts
            ON (
                v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.history_id =
                stats_hosts.host_configuration_version
            )
        INNER JOIN v4_3_configuration_history_hosts a
            ON (
                a.host_id =
                stats_hosts.host_id
            )
    WHERE
        v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id IN (
            SELECT v4_3_configuration_history_clusters.cluster_id
            FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters
            WHERE
                v4_3_configuration_history_clusters.datacenter_id = '$datacenter_id'
        )
        AND v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id IN ( '$cluster_id' )
        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
        AND a.history_id IN (
            SELECT MAX ( b.history_id )
            FROM v4_3_configuration_history_hosts b
            GROUP BY b.host_id
        )
        AND
            CASE
                WHEN '$show_deleted' = 'No'
                    THEN a.delete_date IS NULL
                ELSE
                    a.delete_date IS NULL
                    OR
                    a.delete_date IS NOT NULL
            END
    GROUP BY
        history_datetime,
        COALESCE (
            v4_3_configuration_history_hosts.host_os,
            'Unknown'
        )
) AS a
GROUP BY
    history_datetime,
    os_type, host_count
ORDER BY history_datetime

panels.title: Host OS Break Down Over Time (BR22)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_name AS __text , datacenter_id AS __value FROM v4_3_configuration_history_datacenters
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_name AS __text , datacenter_id AS __value FROM v4_3_configuration_history_datacenters

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT cluster_name AS __text, cluster_id AS __value FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters WHERE datacenter_id IN  ('$datacenter_id')
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT cluster_name AS __text, cluster_id AS __value FROM v4_3_configuration_history_clusters WHERE datacenter_id IN  ('$datacenter_id')
